Class TaskManager

java.lang.Object
TaskProccessing.TaskManager
public class TaskManager extends Object
This class manages Task class. You can only create Task in this class The class is singleton

    • createTask

      public Task createTask(String title, String description, TaskCategory category)
      Method to create tasks According to the task`s category subscribers notified and task added to
      invalid @link 
      {@link @taskByCategoey
      HashMap}
      Parameters:
      title - is tasks` title
      description - is tasks` description
      category - is tasks` category
      Returns:
      it returns new instance of task

    • subscribe

      public void subscribe(TaskCategory category, Subscriber sub)
      method to subscribe user to some category It subscribes to all the category`s tasks If user subscribed to some category it will get updated if new task of the category is created
      Parameters:
      category - is a category to unsubscribe from
      sub - is a user to subscribe to category

    • unsubscribe

      public void unsubscribe(TaskCategory category, Subscriber sub)
      method to unsubscribe user to category It unsubscribes from all the category`s tasks
      Parameters:
      category - is a category to unsubscribe from
      sub - is a user to unsubscribe
